Inside Macintosh: Files /
Chapter 2 - File Manager / File Manager Reference
High-Level HFS Routines

Maintaining Working Directories

The File Manager provides several functions that allow you to manipulate working directories. Working directories are used internally by the File Manager; in general,
your application should not create or directly access working directories. For more information about working directories, see "Working Directory Reference Numbers," beginning on page 2-26.

OpenWD
CloseWD
GetWDInfo
